solution_line_template: If sharks are twice the number of stingrays, then the number of sharks at the aquarium is {sharks_per_stingray} sharks/stingray * {stingrays} stingrays = <<{sharks_per_stingray}*{stingrays}={sharks}>>{sharks} sharks
The number of fish in the tank is {sharks} sharks + {stingrays} stingrays = <<{sharks}+{stingrays}={total_fish}>>{total_fish} fish
